name: The Block
title: Backpack Acquires Ftx Eu
text:
Synopsis
The crypto market is experiencing renewed momentum, with significant ETF inflows, potential regulatory changes, and strategic repositioning by key industry players.

Key Insights
- Backpack Exchange acquired FTX EU, with plans to launch crypto derivatives in the EU in Q1 2025
- Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs attracted over $1.1 billion in combined daily inflows, with Fidelity's Bitcoin ETF leading at $370.2 million
- CFTC Chair Rostin Behnam is stepping down, following years of pushing for crypto regulation
- Czech National Bank is considering bitcoin as a potential reserve asset diversification option
- Arthur Hayes predicts a crypto bull market peak in March 2025, driven by potential $600 billion in liquidity injections
- The Czech Republic has implemented a tax exemption for long-term bitcoin holdings over three years
